verses.verse: מִֽי־ <WH4310> Oh יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> Oh that רֹאשִׁי֙ <WH7218> my head מַ֔יִם <WH4325> were waters וְעֵינִ֖י <WH5869> and mine eyes מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> a fountain דִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> of tears וְאֶבְכֶּה֙ <WH1058> that I might weep יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and night אֵ֖ת <WH853> חַֽלְלֵ֥י <WH2491> for the slain בַת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Oh יִתְּנֵ֣נִי <WH5414> Oh that בַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> I had in the wilderness מְלוֹן֙ <WH4411> a lodging place אֹֽרְחִ֔ים <WH732> of wayfaring men וְאֶֽעֶזְבָה֙ <WH5800> that I might leave אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> my people וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> and go מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <WH853> כִּ֤י <WH3588> them כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> for all מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <WH5003> from them for they [be] all adulterers עֲצֶ֖רֶת <WH6116> an assembly בֹּגְדִֽים׃ <WH898> of treacherous men

וַֽיַּדְרְכ֤וּ <WH1869> And they bend אֶת־ <WH853> לְשׁוֹנָם֙ <WH3956> their tongues קַשְׁתָּ֣ם <WH7198> [like] their bow שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> [for] lies וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not לֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> for the truth גָּבְר֣וּ <WH1396> but they are not valiant בָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth כִּי֩ <WH3588> from מֵרָעָ֨ה <WH7451> from evil אֶל־ <WH413> to רָעָ֧ה ׀ <WH7451> to evil יָצָ֛אוּ <WH3318> for they proceed וְאֹתִ֥י <WH853> לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדָ֖עוּ <WH3045> and they know נְאֻם־ <WH5002> not me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one מֵרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> of his neighbour הִשָּׁמֵ֔רוּ <WH8104> Take ye heed וְעַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> any אָ֖ח <WH251> ye not in any brother אַל־ <WH408> not תִּבְטָ֑חוּ <WH982> and trust כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because כָל־ <WH3605> every אָח֙ <WH251> for every brother עָק֣וֹב <WH6117> will utterly יַעְקֹ֔ב <WH6117> supplant וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every רֵ֖עַ <WH7453> and every neighbour רָכִ֥יל <WH7400> with slanders יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <WH1980> will walk

וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> his neighbour יְהָתֵ֔לּוּ <WH2048> And they will deceive וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> the truth לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> and will not speak לִמְּד֧וּ <WH3925> they have taught לְשׁוֹנָ֛ם <WH3956> their tongue דַּבֶּר־ <WH1696> to speak שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> lies הַעֲוֵ֥ה <WH5753> themselves to commit iniquity נִלְאֽוּ׃ <WH3811> [and] weary

שִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <WH3427> Thine habitation בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> [is] in the midst מִרְמָ֑ה <WH4820> of deceit בְּמִרְמָ֛ה <WH4820> through deceit מֵאֲנ֥וּ <WH3985> they refuse דַֽעַת־ <WH3045> to know אוֹתִ֖י <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold צוֹרְפָ֖ם <WH6884> Behold I will melt וּבְחַנְתִּ֑ים <WH974> them and try כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> what אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> them for how shall I do מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> for בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> folk

חֵ֥ץ <WH2671> [is as] an arrow [שֹׁוחֵט כ] (שָׁח֛וּט <WH7819> kill ק) לְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <WH3956> Their tongue מִרְמָ֣ה <WH4820> deceit דִבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> it speaketh בְּפִ֗יו <WH6310> with his mouth שָׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> peaceably אֶת־ <WH854> for רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> to his neighbour יְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> [one] speaketh וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> but in heart יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> he layeth אָרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH696> his wait

הַעַל־ <WH5921> for אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶפְקָד־ <WH6485> Shall I not visit בָּ֖ם נְאֻם־ <WH5002> them for these [things]? saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אִ֚ם <WH518> On בְּג֣וֹי <WH1471> on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> such כָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> this לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <WH5358> be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> shall not my soul ס

עַל־ <WH5921> For הֶ֨הָרִ֜ים <WH2022> For the mountains אֶשָּׂ֧א <WH5375> will I take up בְכִ֣י <WH1065> a weeping וָנֶ֗הִי <WH5092> and wailing וְעַל־ <WH5921> and for נְא֤וֹת <WH4999> and for the habitations מִדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> of the wilderness קִינָ֔ה <WH7015> a lamentation כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because נִצְּתוּ֙ <WH3341> because they are burned up מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> no אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> so that none עֹבֵ֔ר <WH5674> can pass וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> is not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> through [them] neither can [men] hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice מִקְנֶ֑ה <WH4735> of the cattle מֵע֤וֹף <WH5775> both the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of the heavens וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and the beast נָדְד֖וּ <WH5074> are fled הָלָֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> they are gone

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <WH5414> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> Jerusalem לְגַלִּ֖ים <WH1530> heaps מְע֣וֹן <WH4583> [and] a den תַּנִּ֑ים <WH8577> of dragons וְאֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵ֧י <WH5892> the cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and I will make שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> desolate מִבְּלִ֖י <WH1097> without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> without an inhabitant ס

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man הֶֽחָכָם֙ <WH2450> Who [is] the wise וְיָבֵ֣ן <WH995> that may understand אֶת־ <WH853> זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> hath spoken פִּֽי־ <WH6310> this? and [who is he] to whom the mouth יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about וְיַגִּדָ֑הּ <WH5046> that he may declare עַל־ <WH5921> and מָה֙ <WH4100> how long אָבְדָ֣ה <WH6> perisheth הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> it for what the land נִצְּתָ֥ה <WH3341> [and] is burned up כַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> like a wilderness מִבְּלִ֖י <WH1097> no עֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> that none passeth through ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God עַל־ <WH5921> Because עָזְבָם֙ <WH5800> Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> תּ֣וֹרָתִ֔י <WH8451> my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> them and have not obeyed בְקוֹלִ֖י <WH6963> my voice וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor הָ֥לְכוּ <WH1980> neither walked בָֽהּ׃

וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> have walked אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after שְׁרִר֣וּת <WH8307> the imagination לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> of their own heart וְאַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> and after הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <WH1168> Baalim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לִמְּד֖וּם <WH3925> taught אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> which their fathers ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> behold מַאֲכִילָ֛ם <WH398> Behold I will feed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> them [even] this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this לַֽעֲנָ֑ה <WH3939> with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִיתִ֖ים <WH8248> to drink מֵי־ <WH4325> and give them water רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7219> of gall

וַהֲפִֽצוֹתִים֙ <WH6327> I will scatter בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> them also among the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither יָֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> have known הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like וַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> whom neither they nor their fathers וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <WH7971> and I will send אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> after אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> a sword עַ֥ד <WH5704> until כַּלּוֹתִ֖י <WH3615> them till I have consumed אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> פ

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֛וּ <WH995> Consider וְקִרְא֥וּ <WH7121> ye and call לַמְקוֹנְנ֖וֹת <WH6969> for the mourning women וּתְבוֹאֶ֑ינָה <WH935> that they may come וְאֶל־ <WH413> for הַחֲכָמ֥וֹת <WH2450> for cunning שִׁלְח֖וּ <WH7971> and send וְתָבֽוֹאנָה׃ <WH935> [women] that they may come

וּתְמַהֵ֕רְנָה <WH4116> And let them make haste וְתִשֶּׂ֥נָה <WH5375> and take up עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> up נֶ֑הִי <WH5092> a wailing וְתֵרַ֤דְנָה <WH3381> may run down עֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5869> for us that our eyes דִּמְעָ֔ה <WH1832> with tears וְעַפְעַפֵּ֖ינוּ <WH6079> and our eyelids יִזְּלוּ־ <WH5140> gush out מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> with waters

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because ק֥וֹל <WH6963> For a voice נְהִ֛י <WH5092> of wailing נִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> is heard מִצִּיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> out of Zion אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How שֻׁדָּ֑דְנוּ <WH7703> How are we spoiled בֹּ֤שְׁנֽוּ <WH954> confounded מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> we are greatly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because עָזַ֣בְנוּ <WH5800> because we have forsaken אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because הִשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <WH7993> have cast [us] out מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH4908> because our dwellings ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Now שְׁמַ֤עְנָה <WH8085> Yet hear נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> O ye women דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְתִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> receive אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <WH241> and let your ear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word פִּ֑יו <WH6310> of his mouth וְלַמֵּ֤דְנָה <WH3925> and teach בְנֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1323> your daughters נֶ֔הִי <WH5092> wailing וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> and every one רְעוּתָ֖הּ <WH7468> her neighbour קִינָֽה׃ <WH7015> lamentation

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָ֤לָה <WH5927> is come up מָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> For death בְּחַלּוֹנֵ֔ינוּ <WH2474> into our windows בָּ֖א <WH935> [and] is entered בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH759> into our palaces לְהַכְרִ֤ית <WH3772> to cut off עוֹלָל֙ <WH5768> the children מִח֔וּץ <WH2351> from without בַּחוּרִ֖ים <WH970> [and] the young men מֵרְחֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH7339> from the streets

דַּבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> Speak כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus נְאֻם־ <WH5002> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְנָֽפְלָה֙ <WH5307> shall fall נִבְלַ֣ת <WH5038> Even the carcases הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men כְּדֹ֖מֶן <WH1828> as dung עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> field וּכְעָמִ֛יר <WH5995> and as the handful מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after הַקֹּצֵ֖ר <WH7114> the harvestman וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no מְאַסֵּֽף׃ <WH622> and none shall gather ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַל־ <WH408> nay יִתְהַלֵּ֤ל <WH1984> [man] glory חָכָם֙ <WH2450> Let not the wise בְּחָכְמָת֔וֹ <WH2451> in his wisdom וְאַל־ <WH408> nay יִתְהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> [man] glory הַגִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> neither let the mighty בִּגְבֽוּרָת֑וֹ <WH1369> in his might אַל־ <WH408> nay יִתְהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> [man] glory עָשִׁ֖יר <WH6223> let not the rich בְּעָשְׁרֽוֹ׃ <WH6239> in his riches

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בְּזֹ֞את <WH2063> who יִתְהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> But let him that glorieth הַמִּתְהַלֵּ֗ל <WH1984> glory הַשְׂכֵּל֮ <WH7919> in this that he understandeth וְיָדֹ֣עַ <WH3045> and knoweth אוֹתִי֒ <WH853> כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> me that I [am] the LORD עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> which exercise חֶ֛סֶד <WH2617> lovingkindness מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and righteousness בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> in בְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these חָפַ֖צְתִּי <WH2654> for in these [things] I delight נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וּפָ֣קַדְתִּ֔י <WH6485> that I will punish עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all מ֖וּל <WH4135> all [them which are] circumcised בְּעָרְלָֽה׃ <WH6190> with the uncircumcised

עַל־ <WH5921> and מִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> Egypt וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> and Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and אֱד֞וֹם <WH123> and Edom וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> and the children עַמּוֹן֙ <WH5983> of Ammon וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> and Moab וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all קְצוּצֵ֣י <WH7112> and all [that are] in the utmost פֵאָ֔ה <WH6285> corners הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> that dwell בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness כִּ֤י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> for all [these] nations עֲרֵלִ֔ים <WH6189> [are] uncircumcised וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עַרְלֵי־ <WH6189> [are] uncircumcised לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in the heart ס
